Detailed Description

Class which does the actual work of local path planning and sending commands to base.

Author:
Adam Panzica

Definition at line 33 of file oryx_local_planner.cpp.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

LocalPlanner::LocalPlanner ( int  platform,
double  goalWeight,
double  travWeight,
double  diffWeight,
double  unknWeight,
double  xDim,
double  yDim,
double  zDim,
double  res,
oryx_path_planning::Point &  origin,
std::string &  v_action_topic,
std::string &  oc_point_cloud_topic,
TentacleGeneratorPtr  tentacles 
) throw (std::runtime_error) [inline]

Creates a new local planner.

Author:
Adam Panzica
Parameters:
platforminteger denoting what platform the local planner is running on
goalWeightweighting factor to bias tentacle selection towards the goal point
travWeightweighting factor to bias tentacle selection away from previously traversed points
diffWeightweighting factor to bias tentacle selection away from difficult terrain
unknWeightweighting factor to bias tentacle selection towards from unkown terrain
xDimx dimension of the occupancy grids to use, in real units
yDimy dimension of the occupancy grids to use, in real units
zDimz dimension of the occupancy grids to use, in real units
resresolution of the occupancy grids to use, in real units per grid unit
originOrigin to use for the occupancy grid
v_action_topicActionlib topic to communicate with the base platform
oc_point_cloud_topicTopic name of the ROS topic to receive new occupancy grid data over
tentaclesPointer to the tentacle generator which contains the tentacles to use for planning
v_clientPointer to the velocity client to send commands to the base platform
Exceptions:
std::runtime_errorIf the planner is unable to connect to the base platform

Definition at line 391 of file oryx_local_planner.cpp.

void LocalPlanner::pcCB ( const oryx_path_planning::OccupancyGridMsgConstPtr &  message) [inline, private]

Callback for processing new point cloud data.

Author:
Adam Panzica
Parameters:
messageThe oryx_path_planning::OccupancyGridMsg message to process

Takes the data from the PointCloud2 message, processes it into a new occupancy grid, and places it on the occupancy grid buffer for processing by the planner
